panels.title: CPU & Memory Usage (last $__interval) by single pod

targets.expr:
(
  sum (avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="digma",}[$__interval])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
  -
  sum (avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="digma"}[$__interval])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
)

(
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="digma",}[$__interval])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
  -
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="digma"}[$__interval])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
)

(
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="meloona",}[5m])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
  -
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="meloona"}[5m])) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
)

(
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="meloona",}[5m])) by ()
  -
  sum (min_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="meloona"}[5m])) by ()
)
